parameters.query: INSERT INTO video_analysis_results (source_type, source_path, source_url, analysis_model, duration_seconds, highlights, cut_points, scene_changes, visual_features, edit_instructions, channel_id, content_id) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'gemini-1.5-flash', $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9, $10, $11) RETURNING id
